org.drip.math.spline

Class BasisSplineSegment

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.math.spline.BasisSplineSegment

  • public class BasisSplineSegment
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the basis spline segment fields - the in-elastic ordinates, and the elastic calibratables. Interpolating segments function are implemented in the corresponding spline classes.
